mapper.insert: insert into Car (carId, mid,author, carName, subCarName, national, year, distance, fuel, area, price, content, writeDate, writeTime, readCount) values (#{carId}, #{mid}, #{author}, #{carName}, #{subCarName}, #{national}, #{year},#{distance},#{fuel},#{area},#{price},#{content},#{writeDate}, #{writeTime}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE Car SET carName=#{carName}, distance=#{distance}, area=#{area}, price=#{price}, content=#{content}, writeDate=#{writeDate}, writeTime=#{writeTime} WHERE carId=#{carId}
